text: Ivarkal (ettakaiyorenral) niyayaminrit tam vitukalai vittu veliyerrappattarkal; 'enkalutaiya iraivan oruvantan' enru avarkal kuriyatait tavira (veretuvum avarkal collavillai); manitarkalil cilaraic cilaraik kontu allah tatukkatiruppin aciramankalum ciristavak koyilkalum, yutarkalin alayankalum, allahvin tiru namam tiyanikkappatum masjitukalum alikkappattu poyirukkum; allahvukku evan utavi ceykirano, avanukku titanaka allahvum utavi ceyvan. Niccayamaka allah valimai mikkonum, (yavaraiyum) mikaittonumaka irukkinran
